# The `RangeCheck` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a range check of the form <code>Base</code> + <code>Offset</code> u&lt; <code>Length</code>, with the constraint that <code>Length</code> is not negative. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Represents a range check of the form <code>Base</code> + <code>Offset</code> u&lt; <code>Length</code>, with the constraint that <code>Length</code> is not negative.

<code>CheckInst</code> is the pre-existing instruction in the IR that computes the result of this range check.

Definition at line 239 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/guardwidening-cpp">GuardWidening.cpp</a>.
